response.overview: A girlâ€™s home for wayward teens is overrun with viral possessions and Dr. Olivia Beckett is called in to help, only to recognize the work of the devil. She assembles a new team of exorcists to save the four possessed young ladies, only to discover that one of them may be possessed by an old ally, Father Ryland.
response.title: The Exorcists 2: The Devil's Orphans
